name: Mission: Strike at Midnight
description:
Objective

Steer the spaceship around oncomming obstacles! Unfortunately we have had some bugs, making each steering-computer only cabaple of controling the ship in one direction! 

Watch out for debris, asteroids and spaceships, and make it to the hyperdrive portal!

Controls:

  • WASD Control your spaciemen
  • Shift sprint
  • Space Jump
  • Lmouseclick interact (look at the ship-control-computers while interacting)
